```{r}
btkExp=data.frame(btk=onTarget$expression_20Q4['BTK',],
           cancerType=onTarget$annotation_20Q4$lineage[
             match(colnames(onTarget$expression_20Q4), onTarget$annotation_20Q4$DepMap_ID)])
btkExp$cancerType=gsub('_',' ',btkExp$cancerType)
FigureS2A <- ggplot(na.omit(btkExp), aes(y=btk, x=reorder(str_wrap(cancerType, 15),btk) ))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_bw(base_size = 14)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))+
  labs(x='Cancer Type', y='BTK Expression')
FigureS2A
```

```{r}
ibrutinib_id=onTarget$drugCategory$broad_id_trimmed[grep('ibrutinib',onTarget$drugCategory$name)]

ibrutinib_resp=data.frame(btk=onTarget$secondary_prism[ibrutinib_id,],
           cancerType=onTarget$annotation_20Q4$lineage[
             match(colnames(onTarget$secondary_prism), onTarget$annotation_20Q4$DepMap_ID)])
ibrutinib_resp$cancerType=gsub('_',' ',ibrutinib_resp$cancerType)

FigureS2B <- ggplot(na.omit(ibrutinib_resp), aes(y=btk, x=reorder(str_wrap(cancerType, 15), btk) ))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_bw(base_size = 14)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))+
  labs(x='Cancer Type', y='Viability after\nIbrutinib treatment')
FigureS2 <- grid.arrange(FigureS2A, FigureS2B)
ggsave(FigureS2, filename = '/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Figures/FigureS2.pdf', width = 14, height = 10)
ggsave(FigureS2, filename = '/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Figures/FigureS2.png', width = 14, height = 10)
```
